statements: DELETE FROM device_access_control WHERE device_id = 101 AND user_permission = 'admin';
DELETE FROM device_access_control WHERE user_id = 201 AND user_permission = 'limited';
DELETE FROM device_access_control WHERE user_id = 301 AND device_name = 'Printer';
DELETE FROM users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'Phone%');
DELETE FROM permissions WHERE user_id = 1 AND device_type = 'mobile';
DELETE FROM devices WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM users WHERE role='admin');
DELETE FROM roles WHERE role_id NOT IN (SELECT role_id FROM users WHERE role='admin' OR role='superadmin');
DELETE FROM devices WHERE id IN (SELECT device_id FROM user_devices WHERE user_id = 1);
DELETE FROM permissions WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT permission_id FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1);
